div.p: S. I am sending you three cheeses from Bressia and Tarct sia.
I recently replied to your letters.
You know that the Elector Palatine has passed away, and Frederick of Simmern is to succeed him.
Things are not yet calm in Denmark nor in Cologne. The Turk made an incursion into Tyrol and captured a certain castle of the emperor.
I have not yet heard anything about peace.
I commend my son to you and wish for him to abstain from wine or to drink it very diluted.
I do not know what progress he has made in his studies. Greet Mr. Martyr and Walter and the friends.
Solothurn, the last day of February.
